techmeme.title: Ciroos.AI, whose AI-powered site reliability engineering tool built on MPC and A2A helps businesses automate operations, emerges from stealth and raised $21M (Gina Narcisi/CRN)
Broadcom begins shipping its Tomahawk 6 data center switch chips, which it says can perform the work of six previous-gen chips, to improve GPU utilization rates (Dina Bass/Bloomberg)
Adobe launches Photoshop for Android in beta for devices running Android 11 or later with 6GB+ of RAM, offering tools like layers, masks, and Generative Fill (Aisha Malik/TechCrunch)
Huawei Pura X review: Huawei's ~$1,050, China-only clamshell and first flagship to debut with HarmonyOS offers novel ergonomics but an incomplete app ecosystem (Bloomberg)
Q&A with Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky on Airbnb Experiences, launching new services, OpenAI, AI agents, making decisions at Airbnb, cutting PMs, Jony Ive, and more (Nilay Patel/The Verge)
